local_intent: Perceive the T-block, move to a safe height above it, approach and align to its pose, and verify proximity.
assumptions: Using IsAt(t_block) as a lightweight verification that the tool has reached the approach pose near the block.
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence around the approach phase: perception fallback -> MoveAbove -> ApproachAndAlign; uses identical parameter bins and prepares for subsequent yaw set and push strokes.
